title: League problem on boot up
body: Hi for the last 2 days when i open league it opens and i can see the clickable links etc but there is a black tinge over everything, it does not get to the log in screen at all ....1st day i left it on thinking it was patching or something it did nothing at all, then today i uninstalled and re installed and the same problem exists i have no idea whats going on?

replies.body: It sounds like you might be having a connection problem, failing to download assets.  A reinstall won't really resolve this if the issue is with the network.  Instead, go over the steps in our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide towards a resolution.  Hopefully, that will do the trick!
